Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 167th overall pick, by Oakland in 2015...
Earned first career win on 5/29/2016...
Injured on 6/6/2017 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Traded from Oakland to Philadelphia on 3/2/2018 (Going to OAK: RF Anthony Santander. Going to PHI: P Malik Machado, P Bill Thomas)...
Traded from Philadelphia to Tampa Bay on 4/1/2019 (Going to TB: P Malik Machado, C Chad Wallach, 1B Daric Barton, RF Francisco Sanchez, P Joseph Bouton. Going to PHI: CF Joc Pederson, 3B Brandon M
artin, LF Jeff Freeman, CF Martin Campo)...
Injured on 5/25/2019 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $630,000 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $840,000 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,577,143 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 8/25/2022 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
9/21/2022: Signed a contract extension with Tampa Bay, $10,000,000 per year, for 5 years.
Traded from Tampa Bay to Texas on 1/31/2027 (Going to TEX: P Malik Machado, RF Nick Castellanos, CF Elier Hernandez, P Aaron Sanchez, 1B Pedro Altamirano. Going to TB: P Allen Quigley, C Perry Vi
llanveva)...
Traded from Texas to Minnesota on 7/31/2027 (Going to TEX: P Marcos Quiroz. Going to MIN: P Malik Machado)...
10/31/2027: Signed a contract extension with Minnesota, $12,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
